website_summaries.verdict: Attractive trouser socks by a recognizable brand that top our list in terms of value.
pros: Affordable three-pack includes three patterns - plain, diamond, and ribbed
Mid-calf length is comfortable for most wearers
cons: Material is on the thin side
Socks tend to fit a bit tightly on individuals with larger legs

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Quality - Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised at the quality and fit of these trouser socks. I have purchased similar ones in the stores and they just don't fit as well. I have a large calf and normally dress socks come to mid-point and fall down (or worse - roll down). This product the sock came to my knee, they do not dig in AND they stay put! I have worn them two different days and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sibe Mom

customer_reviews.title: More hose than sock
customer_reviews.text: They're not really socks, but more like a cross between tights and pantyhose. They're tube style, without a heel. They're nice enough, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I felt compelled to write this one because these are the best hidden socks ever
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I felt compelled to write this one because these are the best hidden socks ever: they're comfortable, they stay up, they are very high quality and... I received an incredibly kind and thoughtful email about how they are guaranteed to be perfect and to return them if they're not. Well, they are perfect. I'm tossing out all of my other hidden socks. Thank you for a perfect product! There are very few things I can say that about. I just walked forty blocks in these and not a single slip!
customer_reviews.author: Olive Jam

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for. These are made of a material that is more like a hose type material than a sock. Perfect for dress shoes and for snug boots like Uggs where you don't have much wiggle room to to wear thick socks. These also stay up all day and don't sag or droop.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great legs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! They feel wonderful and make my legs feel good, especially since I am having trouble with Edema
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Hosiery.. is more fitting than "Sock"
customer_reviews.text: Only objection i have to these "socks" is the word "socks" as more trouser "hose" as very thin. Most likely I will use them but not with the loafers I normally wear as heel will slip. Patricia Hauge
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gillen Hauge

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were thicker.
customer_reviews.text: So these are really really thin. If you want these for warmth than get different socks. These are dress socks that are basically just to keep you from getting blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Blair

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good quality. I'm 5'1" and these socks can be worn up to my knee, or just above my knee (which I love). My legs are average/not slender, so I'm pleased that the top part of the sock doesn't cut into my circulation. Great under ankle socks, as well as skirts!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks at nice price.
customer_reviews.text: More substantial than knee high hose, still thin enough to be dressy. The top stays in place without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight for large calves
customer_reviews.text: The calves are way too tight for larger calves. I weigh 130 lbs and 5’4” and these asphyxiated my legs. I moved them around up and down my legs all day and threw them in the trash by day end. I will throw all pairs in trash since I washed them. However I never dried in dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra dee

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Since leggings are "in" now, I haven't been able to find trouser socks in stores. Although I love leggings, I still needed a couple of pair of trouser socks. These are perfect. Fit and thickness are both good. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jaycee7777

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say about these trouser socks, 3 different prints comes all the way up to the knee, very durable this is my third order. A s a matter of fact im ordering some today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR TALL WOMAN
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but a bit too short for my long legs.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The description and reviews indicated that these trouser socks were good for thicker legs and stayed up well without cutting off circulation....not true. They are a nice quality and good for someone who does not have thicker legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the height of the socks because some of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the height of the socks because some of my trousers will ride up when I sit down and show my calves. These socks are up to the bottom of my knee. The only thing is...I wonder how they will last. Very thin which is good for shoes that are too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Andrie

customer_reviews.title: Top Elastic leaves welts on your leg - too tight!
customer_reviews.text: I threw these away. I wore one pair once. The elastic around the top of the sock was so tight it left a red welt around my leg, and I only wore them for a few hours to the theater.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: For the money, these are very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these socks several times. They fit well, are comfortable and last along time. Nothing fancy about them, just a good sock.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Birks

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: So fab to get 3 pair of comfortable socks at great price, without wandering all over stores trying to locate them. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Day

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: The band at the top is too tight like most dress socks, couldn't wear them all day ended up rolling them down
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if I would love or hate these after scrolling through the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would love or hate these after scrolling through the reviews. I LOVE THEM! They are big, comfortable, and stay in place. I have fairly big calves that are very muscular and these easily fit me. They don't dig in at the band either. Wonderful purchase, will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glorified nylons, TIGHT at the top
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for an actual sock but these seem like heavy nylons. Also they are painfully tight at the top. I am always extremely glad to get them off my legs. Will probably not order again.
customer_reviews.author: RamboBeth

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely stunning. I wear them everyday as they are perfect for business casual looks. They are light and comfortable enough to wear all day. They are not too tight or short, they are perfect,
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Too tight at the knee
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Good material. But they are too tight at the knee. They definitely stay put but strangle my leg. I am heavy and maybe a thin person won’t have same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robin K.

customer_reviews.title: Thin socks very soft
customer_reviews.text: Thin socks for boots or shoes that are tight on your feet but you must where a sock.
customer_reviews.author: giana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! And I didnt have to go out and buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B.

customer_reviews.title: These are fine trouser socks
customer_reviews.text: These are fine trouser socks, but they are rather sheer and thus slippery in my shoe. I wear them with mules which have heels and I often feels as it I am slipping out of my shoe. They have held up to washing well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Fair purchase
customer_reviews.text: They’re socks, what can I say? They seem to be good quality and they came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Lint magnet
customer_reviews.text: Attracts every type of lint like a magnet. The top band is too small and doesn’t expand.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tops tend to roll.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is so tight at the top, they leave a deep red ring around my legs. No matter how carefully I pull them up, they tend to roll and really cut off the circulation and it's painful...they may be better after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear with my leggings. The top is too tight and show an indent on my leg. Otherwise they were what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Hole on first use
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these socks, they fit perfectly. I wore one pair for 16 hours and when I removed my shoes there was already a hole on one of the toes. I'm so disappointed cause I had high hopes for these socks...
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Love these Trouser Stockings
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! These are trouser stockings - can be worn with open toe shoes or closed toe shoes. They stay up and don’t cut off my circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Finally - great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, perfect fit (not too long, not too short), nice designs. What more can one want??
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! They fit well
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! They fit well, stay up and are not too tight at the top, but extremely thin, more like nylons, and snagged with the first wearing, not at all like socks! I won't be using them very long at all, due to snagging, and won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great work socks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and do not run small. Nice feel on calves. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be. Flimsy, too ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what they used to be. Flimsy, too small (I'm only a 6 1/2 shoe) have to throw out after a couple of wearings.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Nice quality. And they have a wide enough band at the top that they stay up and don't cut into your calf. The band size was my main criteria in Purchasing these socks. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Horvath

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of them but
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of them but, after i washed them, they shrunk a little bit, and i used gentle cycle and low warm air. Sometimes my legs swell tho, so maybe others won't have my problem.
customer_reviews.author: kathy h

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these today and I am totally impressed so far! They aren't too thick, which I like. I can't stand for my feet to be really hot. They come up over my calves and don't fall down - another reason I am so in love! These are great. Would definitely buy over and over again. Hopefully they last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: These are not socks! These are knee high stockings!
customer_reviews.text: These described as socks. However, they are just good quality stockings. Not what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maritsa MW

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! Brand new and two of the tree pairs of socks are not equal in length.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Trouser Socks are nice.
customer_reviews.text: The Trouser Socks are nice. I am thinking about ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly C Redd

customer_reviews.title: Top's too tight
customer_reviews.text: The socks are ok, but the tops cut off the circulation on my legs. I cut the tops off and they still stay up, well mostly. I still have to pull them up once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Rogan

customer_reviews.title: socks
customer_reviews.text: for the most part very nice the top of sock was a little tight to my liking
customer_reviews.author: Elvira L. Stueve

customer_reviews.title: Great for my work environment when I do not want to wear full panty hose
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well made trouser sock at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort are great especially for the price and best of all they stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bledsaw

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been looking for. A bit thin, but not too thin. I have chubby calves, and they pinch a bit, but otherwise..A-OK!
customer_reviews.author: Wishing for a tree

customer_reviews.title: Trouser Sock Review
customer_reviews.text: As knee-hi socks, these are fine, but they're rather thinner than I expected and very high. I really didn't want something with elastic under the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Filangeri

customer_reviews.title: Not socks. Pantyhose.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a trouser sock. These are nylons. Panty hose material.
customer_reviews.author: Denised1975

customer_reviews.title: Trouser socks--great look and fit
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be the perfect pair of trouser socks for me. I'm delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did my feet good last winter will make sure to stock up on ...
customer_reviews.text: Did my feet good last winter will make sure to stock up on others nice brand and good price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are too thin to hold their shape throughout the day, tend to slide down and pile up in my shoes/boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter I thought they were socks to actually nylons but it never specifies that they are nylons on the product detail
customer_reviews.author: Makila

customer_reviews.title: Okay, so these pretty much suck!
customer_reviews.text: Have to agree with other reviews... way too tight at the top. Cuts off circulation. Thinner than tights. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jae FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: skimpy and synthetic feeling - they look good but don;t feel great
customer_reviews.author: Sarafaith Pekor

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed; lousy quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a good value for the price. Two of the socks were super thin and not comfortable. For the price, skip this item and go to Costco and buy twice as many quality trouser socks for the same price
customer_reviews.author: NatalieM

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is thin
customer_reviews.text: They are a little thin for what I was looking for and a tiny bit tighter around my calves than what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McRae Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Wore once and got a hole in the toe.
customer_reviews.text: Wore once and got o whole in the toe. Tried another pair out of the three pack the next day and the same thing happened. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice fit
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Stay up. Medium weight. Not too tight
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jesse Price

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These socks aren't too thin or too thick. Like Little Bear's bed, they are just right. I like the length of the sock, and it stays up! So far, anyway. I turn the socks inside out and wash them with the delicates. Otherwise, they might fade and shrink like most socks. They are the best trouser socks I've had, but I do recommend treating them gently to prolong their usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed more dark, professional looking socks so I bought these for her. She says they feel and fit great and are just what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: AJos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit perfectly and are super comfy!! I'd definitely purchase from this seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great socks that don't slip
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They don't slip down on my leg. Not too tight or loose for average size leg (I think)
customer_reviews.author: Gail Colby

customer_reviews.title: They are very thin but the elastic holds well. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very thin but the elastic holds well. Unfortunately, I can't really use them for work as my shoe feels to big now.
customer_reviews.author: Hemmik

customer_reviews.title: Good socks for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice socks They are stretching enough and do not bind. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: M. Sarverwest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted at a great price. These are nice trouser socks, not disposable knee-highs.
customer_reviews.author: city dweller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. Good quality. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: its2

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were like stocking material. Just be aware when buying. I thought they were sock material...
customer_reviews.author: romes

customer_reviews.title: Not a top product
customer_reviews.text: Two pair are same. Third one is designed. Non enforced toes, tore after first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Minpins Rule

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They are snug on the leg so they don't fall. They also wash well. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, too thin
customer_reviews.text: These socks are too thin and silky. They make my feet slip in my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rammy

customer_reviews.title: They were too small.  They need to sold as mediun not one size fits all
customer_reviews.text: They were too small. They need to sold as mediun not one size fits all
customer_reviews.author: lois maughan

customer_reviews.title: Love The Socks
customer_reviews.text: I wear pants quite often. If I'm not in pants, my skirts or dresses are long. Sometimes I like to wear the trouser socks instead of knee-high or thigh-high stockings. These are thin enough, strong and smooth to the touch. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: L.Sims

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Three different styles. They stay up beautifully and are nice and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: these socks are ok one pair was too big and one pair was too small
customer_reviews.author: Trina Evans

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Elastic around the top of the sock was too tight and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pat mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Plain, simple,and thin.
customer_reviews.text: A hosiery tube sock. Plain, simple,and thin. A little snug under the knee. Accommodated my chunky calves, stayed up all day. And did I mention thin? I had hoped these would be as heavy as the No Nonsense super opaque tights. Did not happen. Unlovely but wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid222

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My toes went through after 1 wearing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great even after several washing in the washing machine...just wish they came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Garnett

customer_reviews.title: more like a bit more thick then stockings
customer_reviews.text: These are not socks, more like a bit more thick then stockings. If that's what you are looking for then they are great, but I was looking for socks.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore these socks, toes poked through on both feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way my order fits. My order arrived in a timely manner. I was very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A Couch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable trouser socks do not restrict or cut into leg I especially enjoy these socks. Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: jayci3

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These wear almost like thigh high stockings. Nicely made and the fabric is thicker than nylons.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Meade

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I expected. Decent quality. They go a little too high up my calf.
customer_reviews.author: lanu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice different patterns and they stay up on legs. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique H.

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Needed socks for work fast and these came right away. They're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These fall down and bunch up in shoes or boots. I wish I could return them. The toe hem is uncomfy too.
customer_reviews.author: singsalot

product_meta.title: No Nonsense Women's Wardrobe Trouser Sock
product_meta.description: No nonsense wardrobe trouser sock is 3 pair pack which includes one ribbed trouser sock, one flat knit trouser sock and one diamond textured trouser sock. All feature a soft, non-binding comfort top that stays in place. The soft sueded leg yarns provide comfort, great fit and opacity
feature_bullets: Flat Knit: 90% Nylon, 10% Spandex; Rib , Diamond: 91% Nylon, 9% Spandex
Soft, non-binding comfort top that stays in place
3 pack assortment includes a pair of each: Rib Texture, Flat Knit, Diamond Pattern Sock
Perfect option between sheer knee highs and knit socks
